departments.name: Dentistry
departments.description: Provides dental care including cleaning, cavity treatment, and complex oral surgeries.

departments.name: Cardiology
departments.description: Specializes in the diagnosis and treatment of heart and vascular conditions, including hypertension and arrhythmias.

departments.name: ENT Specialists
departments.description: Focuses on diagnosing and treating disorders of the ear, nose, and throat, including infections and voice disorders.

departments.name: Astrology
departments.description: Offers consultations based on the movement of stars and planets to predict life events and provide horoscope analysis.

departments.name: Neuroanatomy
departments.description: Studies the structure and function of the nervous system, addressing complex conditions involving nerve damage and brain disorders.

departments.name: Blood Screening
departments.description: Provides blood analysis to diagnose conditions like anemia, infections, and cholesterol levels.
